attributes.action: consider providiing all adults who grew up in care free access to psychological services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Research shows that children who grow up in Care are very likely to suffer mental & emotional problems as adults, due to early trauma, and the impact of the Care experience. Why, through no fault of their own, should adult care leavers be expected to pay for their own therapy? For those that don't seek help, research is showing that society is already paying the price?
